xmp_property.name: Version
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/Version=Version
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/Version=A 4-character ASCII numeric string giving the version of the cart data structure, particularly the contents and usage of the reserved area. The first two numbers shall give the major release level (with leading 0) from 00 to 99 and the last two shall give the revision level (with leading 0) in the range of 00 to 99.

xmp_property.name: Title
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/Title=Title
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/Title=An ASCII string, 64-characters or less, representing the title of the cut. The title should be a descriptive summary of the audio contents of the file, and may be used as an entry into a table of contents, and so on. Applications that do not support a 64-character title may truncate the field as needed.

xmp_property.name: Artist
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/Artist=Artist
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/Artist=An ASCII string, 64-characters or less, holding the artist or creator name for the audio cut.

xmp_property.name: CutID
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/CutID=Cut ID
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/CutID=An ASCII string, 64-characters or less, representing the cut number, or unique cut key. The string shall be left justified. Some consumer systems can have restricted cut number lengths or allowable character set. These applications should provide some means of synthesizing a usable cut identifier if it has such restrictions.

xmp_property.name: ClientID
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/ClientID=Client ID
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/ClientID=An ASCII string, 64-characters or less, holding a client or customer identification or name.

xmp_property.name: Classification
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/Classification=Classification
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/Classification=An ASCII string, 64-characters or less, holding a classification key. This key can be used for general classification, selection or sorting based on language, locale or other similar applications.

xmp_property.name: OutCue
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/OutCue=Out Cue
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/OutCue=An ASCII string, 64-characters or less, holding the optional out cue phrase to be displayed when the cut is being played. This shall be a user readable cue string.

xmp_property.name: StartDate
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/StartDate=Start Date
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/StartDate=An ASCII date string, 10 characters, of the form YYYY-MM-DD, such as 1998-12-25, holding the start date. Year (YYYY) shall be defined as 0000 to 9999. Month (MM) shall be defined as 01 to 12. Day (DD) shall be defined as 01 to 28, 29, 30 or 31 as applicable. The separator between date fields shall be a hyphen, (-). Note: This format complies with ISO 8601 and is compatible with other dates in BWF files. To signify an immediate start date, applications shall use 1900-01-01.

xmp_property.name: StartTime
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/StartTime=Start Time
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/StartTime=An ASCII time string, 8 characters, of the form hh:mm:ss, such as 12:31:45, representing the 24-hour time-of-day for the start time on the assigned StartDate. Hour (hh) shall be defined as 00 to 23. Minutes (mm) and seconds (ss) shall be defined as 00 to 59. The separator between time fields shall be a colon, (:).If blank, applications shall assume a start time of 00:00:00.

xmp_property.name: EndDate
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/EndDate=End Date
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/EndDate=As in start date, but shall indicate the date after which the sequence will no longer be active. If the sequence is to run forever, the date shall be 9999-12-31. There shall be no default for this field.

xmp_property.name: EndTime
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/EndTime=End Time
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/EndTime=This code shall indicate the time of day on the appointed end date after which the sequence becomes inactive. If blank, applications shall assume an end time of 23:59:59.

xmp_property.name: ProducerAppID
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/ProducerAppID=Producer App ID
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/ProducerAppID=An ASCII string, 64 characters or less, containing the vendor name, product name or both of the program or application that produced the WAVE file with this cart chunk.

xmp_property.name: ProducerAppVersion
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/ProducerAppVersion=Producer App Version
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/ProducerAppVersion=An ASCII string, 64 characters or less, containing the version of the program or applications that produced the WAVE file containing the cart chunk. Because this string is informational only, the application may represent the version in any convenient format.

xmp_property.name: UserDef
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/UserDef=User Defined Text
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/UserDef=An ASCII string, 64 characters or less, whose use and contents may be defined by the user of the system.

xmp_property.name: PostTimer
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/PostTimer=Post Timer
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/PostTimer=Eight Timer structures representing time marks. The time units are in sample periods at the sampling frequency of the associated audio data and are be referenced to the first sample of the audio data. Each timer entry also consists of a FOURCC timer usage identifier.

xmp_property.name: URL
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/URL=URL
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/URL=An ASCII string, 1024-characters or less, representing a universal resource locator (URL) referencing or referenced by the audio program. The URL field contents should conform to URL syntax

xmp_property.name: TagText
xmp_property.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/TagText=Tag Text
xmp_property.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/TagText=Non-restricted ASCII characters containing a collection of strings each terminated by <CR><LF>. This text may be system- or user- defined descriptive text for the sound, such as live tag, script information, descriptive text special instructions, and so on.

xmp_type.name: CartTimer
xmp_type.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/CartTimer=Timer
xmp_type.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/CartTimer=A structure for representing time marks in the AES Cart Chunk within Waveform Audio files.

xmp_field.name: Usage
xmp_field.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/Usage=Usage
xmp_field.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/Usage=A FOURCC usage identifier for this timer.

xmp_field.name: Value
xmp_field.label: $$$/AEScart/labels/Value=Value
xmp_field.description: $$$/AEScart/descriptions/Value=The audio sample offset of this timer.
